room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break Long Island in New York
review: I've done 13 escape rooms before so I was a bit skeptical however Maria was super helpful in helping me figure out a reservation time. We did the Carnival room. Jim was our game master and was fantastic! Super helpful, gave just enough clues to make you feel less incompetent but still didn't give it all away. It was challenging! Although not high tech as I'm used to, it still gave us a run for our money. We escaped with 33 seconds to spare! Would definitely return when on LI.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break Long Island in New York
review: My kids who were cynical about attending to begin with, but afterwards said they really enjoyed this. We did the Carnival room and would definitely give it 5 stars and would absolutely return.This was over the holiday break and the four of them are varied ages (10-21). They were teamed up with a group of 8 who were roughly 12-15 years old. They agreed that all worked together and had fun. Age didn't really make a difference in skill level.The staff was friendly and their facilitator was very personable. At 30 dollars a person I think it is a bit steep, so perhaps there are some discounts for a group.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break Long Island in New York
review: We had my sonâ€™s birthday party here. Great experience from booking with Maria and being greeted to escaping the Midnight Carnival with our hostess Lola who was amazing! We had 2 minutes left when we escaped. Would definitely go back and recommend to anyone wanting a fun yet challenging time!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break Long Island in New York
review: I played "Escape from the Midnight Carnival" with my sons and their friends and we had a blast. The game was fun and the staff was super friendly! I will definitely go back again to try a different room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break Long Island in New York
review: Had my son's 11th birthday here and we all had a blast!! We did Escape the Midnight Carnival room. It was challenging but with the help of our guide, we escaped with 30 seconds to spare! Birthday party host was great too! Well worth the money spent. I highly recommend for a birthday or just to spend an hour exercising your brain muscle, it is well worth it and a lot of fun!
